title: Adele appears to confirm marriage to Simon Konecki by calling him her husband in Grammys acceptance speech
text:
Mr and Mrs? Adele appears to confirm marriage to Simon Konecki by calling him her ‘husband’ in Grammys acceptance speech 
The Hello singer triumphed on Sunday night winning five awards By JILL ROBINSON, SHOWBIZ REPORTER 13th February 2017, 5:52 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ADELE appeared to confirm she has married partner Simon Konecki at Sunday night’s Grammys by calling him her “husband”. 
The Hello singer triumphed at the annual awards ceremony, scooping five awards including Record and Album of the Year gongs. Getty Images Adele appeared to confirm her marriage to partner Simon Konecki at the Grammys Xposure 9 Simon was by Adele’s side at the ceremony 
And during her acceptance speech for her album, 25, she thanked her little family and seemed to reveal they had finally tied the knot. 
She said: “Grammys, I appreciate it, the Academy, I love you, my manager, my husband and my son – you’re the only reason I do it.” AP:Associated Press Adele scooped up five Grammy Awards this evening News Group Newspapers Ltd 9 The couple have been together since 2011 
Speaking about her comeback, she said that it “took an army” to help her get her latest album off the ground. 
Adele said: “I struggled and I still do struggle being a mum but this made me feel in some way like I have got some of myself back again.” Getty Images Adele couldn’t help getting emotional after winning the Grammy for Album of the Year Getty Images Adele said that she couldn’t accept the award because she felt Beyonce deserved it related stories A GRAMMYS OF TWO HALVES Adele overcomes Grammys performance nightmare to be crowned the night's big winner with FIVE awards perils of live TV Lady Gaga and Metallica's fiery duet falters at Grammys as unlikely pair hit by technical mishap STEALING THE SHOW Beyonce's adorable daughter Blue Ivy watches mum's Grammys show in sharp pink suit GETTING IT OFF HER CHEST Lady Gaga shows off plenty of underboob at Grammys 2017 in extremely revealing cut out crop top 
But she glanced down to where Beyonce and her family were sitting and said: “I can’t accept this award because, for me, Beyonce, Lemonade was amazing. 
“It was so monumental and so soul bearing. We saw another side of you that we don’t always get to see. Getty Images Adele first sparked rumours she had married over Christmas Xposure 9 Adele shared a kiss with Simon as her name was called 
“We adore you, you are our light. The way you make me feel, and the way you make my black friends feel, is amazing. I love you so much, I always have and always will.” 
The 28-year-old first set the rumour mill into overdrive that she had tied the knot with the father of her four-year-old son Angelo in December when she was pictured wearing a ring on her wedding finger. Reuters 9 Adele had a big night at the Grammys 
Adele made no effort to conceal the band as she went shopping for health food in Beverley Hills, amid rumours that she was planning to marry Simon, 42, in a Christmas ceremony.
